blogPost.excerpt: InScheduler is an easy to use booking platform that allows hair salons, barbershops, and spas to enable their customers to schedule appointments directly from their website and schedule their staff.
blogPost.body: InScheduler is an easy to use booking platform that allows hair salons, barbershops, and spas to enable their customers to schedule appointments directly from their website and schedule their staff.
blogPost.title: InScheduler - A booking widget that makes scheduling quick and easy
blogPost.author: Areeb Akhter

localize.description: InScheduler是一个易于使用的预订平台，允许发廊、理发店和水疗中心使他们的客户直接从他们的网站上安排预约，并安排他们的员工。
localize.tagline: 一个预订小工具，使调度快速和简单的。

localize.description: InScheduler是一個易於使用的預訂平臺，允許髮廊、理髮店和水療中心使他們的客戶直接從他們的網站上安排預約，並安排他們的員工。
localize.tagline: 一個預訂小工具，使調度快速和簡單的。

previous.excerpt: Your life is full of projects, and [whether you like it or not] you are a project manager. Get all the most relevant core concepts of project management in one place, written by a 5-year Program manager with a PMP. P.S. This is my first published product!
previous.title: Project Management Core Concepts - Book on core concepts of project management in plain English

localize.description: 你的生活充满了项目，[不管你是否喜欢]你是一个项目经理。在一个地方得到所有最相关的项目管理的核心概念，由一个5年的项目经理与PMP写。P.S.这是我的第一本出版的产品!
localize.tagline: 用浅显的英语介绍项目管理的核心概念的书。

localize.description: 你的生活充滿了項目，[不管你是否喜歡]你是一個項目經理。在一個地方得到所有最相關的項目管理的核心概念，由一個5年的項目經理與PMP寫。P.S.這是我的第一本出版的產品!
localize.tagline: 用淺顯的英語介紹項目管理的核心概念的書。
